sections.heading: The court may award costs as are equitable.History.—s. 9, ch. 21820, 1943; s. 38, ch. 67-254.Note.—Former s. 87.09.
sections.text: The court may award costs as are equitable.History.—s. 9, ch. 21820, 1943; s. 38, ch. 67-254.Note.—Former s. 87.09.

sections.heading: When declaratory relief is sought, all persons may be made parties who have or claim any interest which would be affected by the declaration
sections.text: No declaration shall prejudice the rights of persons not parties to the proceedings. In any proceeding concerning the validity of a county or municipal charte
